short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: convert wiki mobile page to desktop page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
version 1.1: added host permission -> it enhance the speed and security level, but cause some wiki sites being unable to convert, if you encounter such problems, please let me know.

Since the last one "Mobile2Desktop" made by someone I didn't remember his/her name is banned by google, I developed a new one.

It simply reads the URL from wikipedia to check whether it is a mobile page or not, and convert it to a desktop page.

Welcome to share your feedback if there's any trouble using it.
